thread.title: How Andrew Bogut lost 10kg in one month
thread.title_full: How Andrew Bogut lost 10kg in one month

title: How Andrew Bogut lost 10kg in one month
text:
Warriors centre Andrew Bogut drops 10 kilos after cutting sugar from his diet Olgun Uluc FOX SPORTS Warriors centre Andrew Bogut drops 10 kilos after cutting sugar from his diet Olgun Uluc FOX SPORTS   
Aussie NBA star Andrew Bogut has opened up about Jarryd Hayne's journey to the NFL. Bogut describes the 49ers newcomer as "The   James." September 29th 2015 7 days ago   
THE Golden State Warriors will have a new-look Andrew Bogut entering the 2015/16 NBA season, with the big-man dropping an impressive 10 kilograms over the off-season. 
Bogut spoke with CSNBayarea.com’s Monte Pool , crediting his weight-loss to New Zealand documentary ‘Is Sugar the New Fat?’, which aired on SBS in August. 
“I changed my diet a little bit. It’s really worked wonders for me,” said Bogut. 
“I watched that documentary. It’s unbelievable, man. (Sugar) is in absolutely everything. I have a couple friends that are label readers. I used to give them so much (crap), telling them, ‘Man, just eat it. Stop reading the label.’ And now I’m one of those guys.” 
The Australian big-man is hoping this new lifestyle change can translate to his play, and carry over when the NBA season begins on October 27th. 
“I want to get a couple post moves, roll to the glass strong and finish. It takes a lot of pressure off us, then we can get a decent shot from the perimeter,” said Bogut. Other Stories
